channel.desc: Nick, Monroe and Hank discover that members of the wesen world have been responsible for a series of bank robberies; Juliette questions her mental state.

channel.title: Grimm
channel.desc: When a woman dies after becoming suddenly blind, Nick and Hank discover a wesen that feeds off tears; Adalind considers her situation; Rosalee tries to help Juliette recover her memory.
